title: Watering Wisely
description: Water indoor plants only when the top inch of soil feels dry. Overwatering can cause root rot.
extraTip: Always use pots with drainage holes.

title: Right Amount of Sunlight
description: Most indoor plants prefer bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid placing them under harsh direct sun.
extraTip: Rotate plants weekly for even growth.

title: Know Your Plant
description: Different plants have different care needs. Always check plant-specific requirements.
extraTip: Label your plants with care instructions.
